laboratory_examinations.findings: Negative for toxigenic C. difficile by the Illumigene DNA amplification assay. (Reference Range-Negative).

A pigtail drainage catheter in place in the right lobe, with a small residual pocket of complex fluid measuring approximately 2.4 x 4.4 x 4.0 cm. This is much smaller than the previous abscess, which measured approximately 6.3 x 11.4 cm. The remainder of the liver is normal with no other fluid collections, nor any evidence of bile duct dilatation. The portal vein is patent with hepatopetal flow.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Reduction in size of the abscess from approximately 6.3 x 11.4 cm to 2.4 x 4.4 x 4.0 cm.
